review: Love it . easy to use and very good picture
author: darrell

review: So much for Plug and Play!  More like Plug and Hassle.  The Chromecat could not find the WiFi network even though (a) my router is a standard high-end Asus model; (b) I have never had problems adding connecting other devices to it - phones, printers, tablets, computers, headsets.The solutions offered required stepping into a serious technical morass for all sorts of settings on the router, which I would not attempt since I will not risk breaking the other good-functioning devices.  Much easier for me to continue connecting my laptops directly and remote mouse and KB.
author: NYDenizen "NYDenizen"

review: I love this thing.  I can finally watch my Netflix on a bigger screen than my laptop!  This was the cheapest price around too.
author: Sandra Sinanian

review: Love being able to stream from my PC to the TV. Get to share lots of web sites, pictures and shows. Should have purchased one a long time ago! Basically very easy to connect to my HDTV and start using right away.
author: C. Egan "photographer1-2-b"

review: this is so simple to use and super quality.  casts u tube and netflix to your big screen
